message:
#design_patterns #Well_explained
This is not java DP or js DP course... the material explains the top 7 patterns used nowadays by all the languages n frameworks out there.
in the fourth module, they explained the decorator Pattern which is a necessity to understand angular2, overall the materials of this course is very rich yet simple... worth every dim!
--------------------
U can obtain this course by two ways, the right way which is buy it!
Or the Egyptian way :D , create a new account, start your trial period and ....
Namaste ã€€
story: Muhammad Hasan shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Foundations of Programming: Design Patterns
caption: lynda.com
description: Identifies seven object-oriented design patterns (including the singleton, observer, decorator, and factory patterns) that make your development process faster and easier.
